about_the_game:
Change Rean's in-game outfit to Divine Blade Rean’s Instructor Uniform.
Divine Blade Rean’s Instructor Uniform

Change Shizuna's in-game outfit to Silver Assassin.
Shizuna: Silver Assassin

Change Altina's in-game outfit to Sen no Kiseki IV ver. Traveling Costume.
Altina's Traveling Costume
Altina's Traveling Costume (Hat)

Change Rufus's in-game outfit to Black Mask and Lapis's to Rosenberg Dress.
Rufus: Black Mask
Lapis: Rosenberg Dress

A set of useful items supplied by MK Company.
Attack 2 x1
HP 2 x1
Red Medallion x1
U-Material x5
Celestial Balm x3
Zelam Capsule x1
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.

*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After unlocking costumes, apply them via [EQUIP] -> [Costumes] in the main menu.
